metadata.title: CVE-2024-22258 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Spring Authorization Server versions 1.0.0 - 1.0.5, 1.1.0 - 1.1.5, 1.2.0 -1.2.2 and older unsupported versions are susceptible to a PKCE DowngradeAttack for Confidential Clients.Specifically, an application is vulnerable when a Confidential Client usesPKCE for the Authorization Code Grant.An application is not vulnerable when a Public Client uses PKCE for theAuthorization Code Grant.

criterions.comment: spring package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
